DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study investigate effect , tolerability safety different dose regimen AZD8848 administer intranasally seasonal allergic rhinitis patient season allergen challenge model .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study Allergic Rhinitis Patients After Intranasal Administration AZD8848
DOC.detailed_description: A double-blind , placebo control , randomise , parallel group phase IIa study investigate efficacy , tolerability , safety different dose regimen AZD8848 administer intranasally seasonal allergic rhinitis patient pollen season nasal allergen challenge model
DOC.criteria: Seasonal allergic rhinitis patient pollen season Have history presence birch and/or timothy grass pollen induce seasonal allergic rhinitis least previous 2 year ( verified positive skin prick test ) Patients need treatment nasal symptom pollen season Symptomatic perennial allergic nonallergic rhinitis Family history autoimmune disease A history asthma
